original_text: And you say, ‘If anyone swears by the altar, it is nothing, but if anyone swears by the gift that is on the altar, he is bound by his oath.’
korean_text: 너희가 또 이르되 누구든지 제단으로 맹세하면 아무 일 없거니와 그 위에 있는 예물로 맹세하면 지킬지라 하는도다

sentences.original_text: but if anyone swears by the gift on the altar,
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 만일 누가 제단 위의 예물을 두고 맹세하면,

sentences.original_text: he is bound by his oath.’
